Labour cost. This line should be an OPEX Fixed Specific but throws an error, as no OCF was found in the source. Assumed to be 0.9 (original value is 3 EUR/t). Results from this table were obtained from steelonthenet.
According to the source, additional coal is needed to achieve 2% carbon content in steel and 100% charge of sponge iron in the EAF.
This reference assumes the value provided by Wörtler et al., 2013.
Cold DRI case: An additional 159kWh/t LS is needed. This is not explicit in the paper, but was clarified by an exchange with the author.
Hot DRI case. This is not explicit in the paper, but was clarified by an exchange with the author.
